Description:
Detects potentially suspicious file downloads directly from IP addresses and stored in suspicious locations using Wget.exe

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious File Download From IP Via Wget.EXE - Paths
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((process_path like '%\wget.exe' and original_file_name = 'wget.exe') and command re '://[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}' and command like '%http%' and (command re '\s-O\s' and command like '%--output-document%') and ((command like '%:\perflogs\%' or command like '%:\temp\%' or command like '%:\users\public\%' or command like '%:\windows\help\%' or command like '%:\windows\temp\%' or command like '%\temporary internet%') and (command like '%:\users\%' and command like '%\favorites\%') and (command like '%:\users\%' and command like '%\favourites\%') and (command like '%:\users\%' and command like '%\contacts\%') and (command like '%:\users\%' and command like '%\pictures\%')))
